name: Button Mashers
description:
After tons of messing around with programming tools within other games, this is the first time I've actually reached out and done something standalone. The app is pretty basic, but from it I've gotten a lot more used to Unity than I had been, which in itself made the jam worth it to me.

Music by Hamster: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6zwGwJC57g4
